# accessibilityValue()

**Instance Method**

Returns the text that the accessibility element displays.

## Declaration

```swift
func accessibilityValue() -> String?
```

## Return Value

The text displayed by the element.

## Discussion

This method is the getter for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibilityProtocol] protocol’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAccessibility-c.protocol/accessibilityValue] property.

## Supporting Accessibility

- **accessibilityAttributedString(for:)**: Returns the attributed substring for the specified range of characters.
- **accessibilityVisibleCharacterRange()**: Returns the range of visible characters in the document.
